nodes.text: The campaign at Salient was a multi-week battle that took place in the Salient system in 18 BBY. Moff Wilhuff Tarkin led the Galactic Empire's military while Saw Gerrera's Partisans were led by a number of commanders, including Captain Has Obitt, led the rebelling factions on Salient's worlds, Salient I and Salient II.
